name: The Smooth Sound of Sax
description:
You play a mysterious individual with a potentially troubled past, to overcome this potential you must look to the present - or to the left where a giant sax lays waiting to be played.

There's only one way to win, and that's to play some smooth sounds, but watch out for the white person. They only want to play because you want to play.

Move with left and right with the arrow keys, when on the saxophone you can move up and down to play it. Remember, once you hit that saxophone you commit to playing it.

The program will take a minute or two to load due to the use of sound files.

Music:

- Kevin MacLeod: Bass Vibes

- Kevin MacLeod: Happy Bee
